name: All About Bullets
description:
For the Zeno Game Jam

16 hour total development time

have fun shooting creatures with special bullets

survive the 5 waves

.

.

.

.

Controls:

WASD movement

Left Shift - sprinting

Left Mouse Click - shoot + short chamber spin

Right Mouse Click - short chamber spin

Mouse Wheel - long chamber spin (clockwise and counter-clockwise)
